item.description: Open Source Projects boca-chica-bot A serverless Twitter Bot written in Go using AWS Lambda , DynamoDB , and EventBridge . lambda-edge-azure-auth A Lambda@Edge function that enables Microsoft Azure AD authentication for apps using Amazon CloudFront . terraform-aws-lambda-edge-azure-auth A Terraform Registry module for lambda-edge-azure-auth . reveal.js-docker Maintained docker images for reveal.js - the open source HTML presentation framework.
